channel.title: StormPigs Video Podcast
channel.itunes:author: StormPigs
channel.description: These guys get together and play improvisational rock and funk. It comes together organically.
channel.itunes:subtitle: Various pigs will join the trough, so expect the unexpected. Or not. Produced with Open Source tools: Cinelerra, ffmpeg, mplex and vlc.
channel.itunes:summary: Getcher rock and roll, yer funk, yer psychadelic fix here with dudes who aren't half bad, I must say.
